package.name: Validate_Finance_CreditCard
package.description: Package to validate Credit Card numbers and types.

release.notes: - Switch to the new BSD License (see http://www.opensource.org/licenses/bsd-license.php)
- Added support for Eurocard/Mastercard. Can be referenced by "EuroCard" or "EuroCard/MasterCard" (case-insensitive)

- Split from Validate into independent package - BC break: creditCard() method now named number() and creditCardType() method is now named type() - Request #2194 Improved CreditCard validation with CreditCard Type check, patch by Philippe - Added a cvv() method to check card verification value (aka CVV2, CVC, CID, CSC, CIN)
